Post: "As I sit alone in my dark apartment on Halloween, surrounded by the constant reminders of happiness and togetherness, I can't help but feel an overwhelming sense of loneliness and disappointment. It's hard to shake off the feeling of inadequacy and low self-esteem that clings to me like a shadow. And as New Year's Eve approaches, I can't help but feel a sense of hopelessness wash over me. Maybe this year will be different, maybe I'll finally find some peace. But until then, the thought of ending it all is always there, lurking in the back of my mind."
